verses.roman:
prabhura vicchede bhakta karena rodana
bhaktera vicchede prabhura viṣaṇṇa haila mana

synonyms: prabhura—from Lord Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; vicchede—by separation; bhakta—all the devotees; karena—do; rodana—crying; bhaktera—of the devotees; vicchede—by the separation; prabhura—of Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu; viṣaṇṇa—morose; haila—became; mana—the mind.
translation: Due to the impending separation from Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu, all the devotees began to cry. The Lord was also morose due to separation from the devotees.
